  # Revision Tool

  [![Releases](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/MeetRevision/revision-tool.svg?label=Release)](https://github.com/MeetRevision/revision-tool/releases/latest)
  [![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/meetrevision/revision-tool/total?label=Downloads)](https://github.com/meetrevision/revision-tool/releases)
  [![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/MeetRevision/revision-tool.svg?label=License)](https://github.com/MeetRevision/revision-tool/blob/main/LICENSE)
  [![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/619835916139364383?label=Discord&color=D50000&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://discord.gg/962y4pU)
  [![Donate](https://img.shields.io/badge/Support_us-Donate-darkgreen?logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%2CPD94bWwgdmVyc2lvbj0iMS4wIiBlbmNvZGluZz0iaXNvLTg4NTktMSI%%2BDQoJPGc%%2BDQo8L2c%2BDQo8L3N2Zz4%3D)](https://revi.cc/donate)

</div>

<br>

A tool to personalize [ReviOS](https://www.revi.cc/) to your needs. Rewritten in Dart with Fluent UI.

> [!WARNING]  
> This program is strictly intended for **ReviOS (22.10 or higher)**. It is **not meant to run on non-ReviOS systems** and may cause issues if used elsewhere.

## License

Revision Tool is licensed under the [GNU General Public License v3.0](LICENSE). 

The tool also contains:
* [Fluent System Icons](https://github.com/microsoft/fluentui-system-icons) by Microsoft - MIT
